Text: CommentaryHey I missed your wonderful response on Monday Tim filled me in I was on a plane to Notre Dame on Monday when I heard the wonderful news of my termination Oh well lifes a bitch No bets for the LSU game but I feel that LSU should give the Vols a run for their money Texas finally wised up and gave Major the startMack must need to win this bowl game Oh well have fun at work I have to go back to sleep
